content:
I am a university fresh graduate and looking for jobs in New York. Can you help me to look for the job salary in new york?
Begin!
Question: Could you please provide the specific job title you are looking for in New York to obtain the salary estimation?

name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': '74e5b647-8d20-4f20-9ad0-b844779cab6e', 'parameters': {'job_title': 'nodejs developer', 'location': 'new york', 'location_type': 'ANY', 'years_of_experience': None}, 'data': [{'location': 'New York City, NY', 'job_title': 'Nodejs Developer', 'min_salary': 111347.08, 'max_salary': 184871.11, 'median_salary': 142386.9, 'salary_period': 'YEAR', 'salary_currency': 'USD', 'publisher_name': 'Glassdoor', 'publisher_link': 'https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Nodejs%20Developer&locT=C&locId=1132348', 'confidence': 'CONFIDENT'}]}"}

I found the salary estimation for a Node.js Developer in New York:

- **Minimum Salary:** $111,347.08
- **Maximum Salary:** $184,871.11
- **Median Salary:** $142,386.90
- **Salary Currency:** USD
- **Source:** [Glassdoor](https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Nodejs%20Developer&locT=C&locId=1132348)

If you need more information or assistance with job searching, let me know! 

Now, I will call the Finish function to summarize this information.

function.arguments: {"final_answer":"The estimated salary for a Node.js Developer in New York is: Minimum $111,347.08, Maximum $184,871.11, and Median $142,386.90. Source: [Glassdoor](https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Nodejs%20Developer&locT=C&locId=1132348). If you need further assistance with job searches, feel free to ask!","return_type":"give_answer"}
function.name: Finish
